FuncDef: This command configures the minimum time duration, in milliseconds, of the Fast Channel Change (FCC) burst. The value of this object determines the starting point of the FCC burst. If the current Group of Pictures (GOP) has less than the minimum duration worth of data, FCC burst begins from the previous GOP.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the FCC burst minimum duration, in milliseconds. Values-300 to 8000.
